price: នៅពេលលូតដែលជាបងប្អូនរបស់ពួកគេបានពោល ទៅកាន់ពួកគេថាៈ តើពួកអ្នកមិនកោតខ្លាចអល់ឡោះទេឬ?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum lūṭun alā tattaqūna
